import { useState } from 'react'; import { useNavigate } from 'react-router-dom'; const Home = () => { const [activeSection, setActiveSection] = useState(null); const navigate = useNavigate(); // Handle Learn More logic const handleLearnMore = (section) => { setActiveSection(section); // Navigate based on the section clicked if (section === 'government') { navigate('/government-services'); } else if (section === 'tutorials') { navigate('/tutorials'); } else if (section === 'reminders') { navigate('/reminders'); } else if (section === 'online-services') { navigate('/online-services'); } else { console.error('Section not implemented yet'); } }; return (
